column4: I just updated Ubuntu fiesty 7.04, did the restart and find that evolution-data-server-1.10 is using 80% or more of my CPU all the time. any clue how to fix this?
best to search launchpad for it. if it's not reported, report it.
nevermind, it's the stable release, it should work already :P
I dont' even use evolution. can't I just keep it from starting some how?
